function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate policy and law formulation in urban planning due to lack of consideration for digital fluency and digital rich environments","Impact":"Ineffective management of urban areas, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of technological advancements","Mitigation":"Incorporate digital fluency and technological advancements in policy formulation, enhance digital literacy and skills development","Technologies":"Digital twins, 5G and 6G connectivity, telemedicine, teleworking","People":"Land use decision makers, community members, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, education institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on old-school drawing culture and impersonal AutoCAD representations due to contemporary addiction to digital narrative rich television shows and movies","Impact":"Inaccurate representations of urban environments and infrastructure, leading to potential mismanagement and health risks","Mitigation":"Encourage integration of advanced digital simulations and representations, promote digital literacy and skills development, update educational curricula","Technologies":"Digital simulations, virtual experiences, digital twins, 5G and 6G connectivity","People":"Land use decision makers, digital influencers, educators","Owner":"Urban planners, educational institutions, digital media industry"},{"Description":"Potential limitations in using 5G and 6G technologies for telemedicine, teleworking, and real-time communication in health sector","Impact":"Inability to effectively combat contagious diseases, potential transmission of diseases due to technological limitations","Mitigation":"Invest in robust infrastructure for 5G and 6G, enhance cybersecurity measures, train healthcare professionals in utilizing advanced technologies","Technologies":"5G and 6G connectivity, telemedicine, medical imaging, robotics","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, public health agencies","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, technology providers"}]}
